description: A protocol for controlling a web browser using the GeminiComputerUse tool.

rules.description: When this rule is invoked, the agent must use the `gemini_computer_use` tool to perform a web-based task.

arguments.name: task
arguments.description: The task to perform, e.g., 'fill out the form on example.com'

safety_guidelines: The agent must not perform any actions that could result in financial loss or the exposure of sensitive information.
The agent must not attempt to bypass any security measures, such as CAPTCHAs.
The agent must always operate in a sandboxed environment to prevent any potential damage to the host system.
